titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2857) to reauthorize and reform the national service laws.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-539, by Ms. Matsui.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2857 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be considered read. A specified amendment is in order.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 193.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1015.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 217 - 193, 1 Present (Roll no. 103).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 222 - 190 (Roll no. 104).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 3/6/2008--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 2857 (Generations Invigorating Volunteerism and Education Act).
